products.title: Men Brown Jeans
products.body_html:
Our most popular jeans have made a stylish return. These jeans are defined by their stylish look with added comfort. These jeans are ideal for anyone that wants to stand out.

 

– Soft denim

– regular on the waist

– Button and zip fly fastening

– Belt loops

– Soft jersey fabric

– Machine washable

– Do not tumble dry

– Do not dry clean

products.title: Kids Yellow Sweatshirt
products.body_html:
Super warm and cozy top for the little ones, this top is very comfortable and will definitely become a favorite top for any child during the winter months.
Unisex

products.title: Ladies Navy Legging
products.body_html:
Walk-in style with these trendy-looking waistband leggings, something different from everyday wear.

Full-length leggings with an elasticated waist band. Shine-coated finish.

These leggings are both stylish and comfortable at the same time. A must for every wardrobe.

  • Style: full length
  • Black
  • Design: Plain
  • Fabric: 94% cotton 6% elastane

products.title: Black Men Hoodie
products.body_html:
This zipped black SMAMZ hoodie is a must for all. Its comfortable feel along with its classic look is suitable for the modern man. 


- Hooded neckline

- Drawstring hood

- Long sleeves

- Zipped Pocket front

- Soft jersey fabric

- Machine washable 

- SMAMZ logo on the left chest

products.body_html:

- Hooded neckline

- Slit on the sides for added comfort

- Drawstring hood

- Long sleeves

- Pocket front

- Soft jersey fabric

- Machine washable 

- SMAMZ logo on the left chest

products.title: Ladies Fleece Black Modest Hoodie
products.body_html:
Featuring you our favorite article of this season, Fleece winter black hoodie.

Wear it anywhere, pair it with anything. You can't go wrong with a modest fit hoody for a rest day or your workout. Features are stripped white sleeves perfect to pair with our loose-fit trousers or joggers. When you're craving comfort, reach for this hoodie that is perfect to take you from morning to evening.

Hurry up !!!

Grab this modest hoodie before it runs out of our stores!!!

Product details:
Fabric: fleece
Colour: skin
Winter wear
Full sleeves
Relaxed fit


Special Notes:
DO NOT BLEACH
DO NOT TUMBLE DRY
MACHINE WASH COLD

products.title: Ladies Fleece Skin Modest Hoodie
products.body_html:
Presenting you our most demanding article of winter, fleece hoodie, cut in the ultimate modest fit.

This fleece hoody is available in two contemporary colours combination, skin with black striped sleeves. This hoodie is the perfect way to indulge this season. Engineered to a mini-length with a hoodie and sweatshirt-inspired silhouette, with a silk knit-like feel it gives a cool edge to feminine dressing.

Buy this hoodie and add a comfortable yet trendy vibe to your wardrobe!!!

Product details:
Fabric: fleece
Colour: skin
Winter wear
Full sleeves
Relaxed fit

Special Notes:
DO NOT BLEACH
DO NOT TUMBLE DRY
MACHINE WASH COLD

products.title: Ladies Olive Green Polo Neck Jumper
products.body_html:
Don’t miss out on this slouchy but trending mini jumper dress

Olive green knitted jumper dress in a slouchy fit and mini length with crew neck and long sleeves.

  • Style: Jumper dress
  • Design: Plain
  • Length: Mini
  • Neckline: Polo
  • Sleeve Length: Long Sleeve

Wash with extra care (follow instructions on the label)

Do NOT tumble dry

products.title: Ladies Maroon Polo Neck Jumper Dress
products.body_html:
Go back to nature with your knits this season and add this cosy polo neck dress to your wardrobe.

 In a marvellous maroon fluffy knit, the figure-hugging dress will show off your curves while keeping you comfy all day long. It’s finished with a roll neck and long sleeves for extra warmth.


  • Style: Jumper dress
  • Design: Plain
  • Length: Mini
  • Neckline: Polo
  • Sleeve Length: Long Sleeve

Wash with extra care (follow instructions on the label)

Do NOT tumble dry
